name: Follower Collector
description:
Hello world from Hell-O'-World, this is Monoh, your Unity teacher from the hell!

So the basic idea for Ludum Dare 52:

When I checked the theme (and I slept again), I thought I'm investing time and energy in my YouTube channel nowadays and want to harvest as much as possible. When I invest so much time on it, and I start to refresh analysis every five minutes.

You can find me in my YouTube

https://youtube.com/@MonohBehavior

or Twitter

https://twitter.com/MonohBehavior
